General.Name: JiangXi BaiSheng Intelligent Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: JiangXi BaiSheng Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells access control and management equipment in China and internationally. Its products include road gates; barriers, such as standard, advertising, and heavy barriers; door openers comprising sliding, industrial, telescopic, and swing door operators; lifting floor columns; license plate recognition equipment; and access doors. The company was formerly known as Bisen Smart Access Co.,Ltd. JiangXi BaiSheng Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Nanchang, China.
General.Address: No.1220 Xiaolan Middle Avenue, Nanchang, China, 330052
